item.title: 在美国寻求监管稳定币的同时，Tether 将目光投向别处
item.description: 虽然美国国会正在审议有助于将稳定币更多地融入主流金融的法案，但最大的数字代币发行商表示，它将继续专注于服务美国以外的市场。【原文：While Congress is considering bills that would help integrate stablecoins more into mainstream finance, the largest issuer of the digital tokens says it will continue to focus on serving markets besides the US.】

item.title: 特朗普称苹果关税还将针对三星和其他制造商
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他周五早些时候威胁对苹果公司征收的关税也将针对包括三星电子公司在内的设备制造商，以刺激它们将产品生产转移到美国。【原文：President Donald Trump said that the tariffs he threatened against Apple Inc. earlier Friday would also be aimed at device makers including Samsung Electronics Co. to spur them into moving manufacturing of their products to the US.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普暂停主权财富基金关注债务问题
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府暂停了创建主权财富基金的计划，因为总统优先考虑偿还国债。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration paused plans to create a sovereign wealth fund as the president prioritizes paying down the national debt.】

item.title: 交易员因政策风险抛弃美国，新兴股市和外汇市场上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普再次发出关税威胁，投资者纷纷撤离美国资产，新兴市场货币和股市周五走高。【原文：Emerging-market currencies and stocks advanced on Friday, as President Donald Trump’s renewed tariff threats sent investors rushing out of US assets.】

item.title: Cenovus 首席执行官在推动有机增长的同时淡化收购 MEG 的可能性
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc.的高层管理人员淡化了这家油砂生产商提出收购MEG Energy Corp.的可能性，称他更专注于扩大现有资产，而不是进行收购。【原文：Cenovus Energy Inc.’s top executive downplayed the chance the oil sands producer would offer to buy MEG Energy Corp., saying he’s more focused on expanding existing assets than making acquisitions.】

item.title: 视频游戏公司面临人工智能问题：玩家不想要它
item.description:
EA和Take-Two等出版商正就人工智能可能带来的 "声誉 "风险向股东发出警告

。【原文：

Publishers like EA and Take-Two are warning shareholders about the potential “reputational” risks of AI

】

item.title: 全食超市工会获得劳工局认证，亚马逊杂货商首开先河
item.description: 费城的一家全食超市（Whole Foods Market）门店成立了工会，这是亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：A union has been certified at a Whole Foods Market store in Philadelphia, marking a US first for the Amazon.com Inc. grocery chain.】

item.title: 欧盟将在消费者保护调查升级过程中警告申银万国
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，欧盟将向在线市场Shein Group Ltd.发出警告，这将使欧盟委员会对该公司的消费者保护调查升级。【原文：The European Union is set to issue a warning to online marketplace Shein Group Ltd. that will escalate the commission’s consumer protection probe into the company, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 新品种复杂基金逆袭 "先锋效应
item.description:
根据彭博资讯（Bloomberg Intelligence）的数据，新推出的 ETF 的平均成本已攀升至创纪录的 65 个基点

。【原文：

The average cost of a newly launched ETF has climbed to a record 65 basis points, according to Bloomberg Intelligence

】

item.title: 播客行业的分裂日益严重
item.description:
在伦敦举行的播客展会上，业界正在努力实现向视频领域的飞跃

。【原文：

At the Podcast Show in London, the industry is grappling with its evolutionary leap into video

】

item.title: 保加利亚如何逐步加入欧元区
item.description: 保加利亚有望获得欧盟批准，在 2026 年 1 月采用欧元。这个欧盟最贫穷的成员国多年来一直在为加入单一货币打基础，历届政府都声称这将有助于缩小与欧盟其他国家的贫富差距。【原文：Bulgaria looks to be on track to win the European Union’s approval to adopt the euro in January 2026. The bloc’s poorest member has being laying the groundwork for years to join the single currency, with successive governments claiming this will help close the wealth gap with other EU states.】

item.title: 巴塞罗那足球俱乐部寻求债务修正案，以争取时间完工球场
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴塞罗那足球俱乐部（FC Barcelona）正在寻求修改其债务条款，以便有更多的时间完成诺坎普球场（Spotify Camp Nou）的改造工程。【原文：FC Barcelona is seeking to amend the terms of its debt to allow more time to finish the revamp of its Spotify Camp Nou stadium, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 穆迪下调美国评级后，纯净的应税债券有望获得收益
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，由于穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了美国政府的评级，投资者将到其他地方寻找优质信用，因此高质量的应税市政债券有望获得提振。【原文：High-quality taxable municipal bonds are poised to get a boost as the downgrade of the US government by Moody’s Ratings will leave investors looking elsewhere for pristine credits, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 加纳保持利率稳定，塞地反弹将抑制通胀
item.description: 加纳央行继续维持关键利率不变，以保持通胀下行压力，预计通胀将从这个西非国家的世界性货币中得到提振。【原文：Ghana’s central bank kept its key interest rate on hold to maintain downward pressure on inflation, which is expected to get a boost from the West African nation’s world-beating currency.】

item.title: 艾德-雅德尼说，情况并不像你想象的那么糟
item.description:
在本期Merryn Talks Money节目中，这位华尔街资深人士预测 "华丽七侠 "和美国消费者将为市场带来好运。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, the Wall Street veteran predicts the Magnificent Seven and US consumers will carry the day for markets.

】

item.title: 贝森特认为今夏美国国债资本规则将放宽
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，美国监管机构可能会在今年夏天取消一项限制银行在 29 万亿美元国债市场交易的规定。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that US regulators may lift a rule that’s served as a constraint on banks’ trading in the $29 trillion Treasuries market this summer.】

item.title: 欧元区主要经济体现在的通胀率可能在 2% 或以下
item.description: 据经济学家称，欧元区四大经济体的通胀率都达到或低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标。【原文：Inflation in all of the euro zone’s four biggest economies is at or below the European Central Bank’s 2% target, according to economists.】

item.title: 受特朗普新关税威胁影响，美元 2025 年跌幅达 7
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对欧盟征收新的高额关税，再次引发了投资者对全球贸易政策的担忧，美元汇率周五下滑，将今年以来的跌幅扩大到 7% 以上。【原文：The dollar slid Friday, extending this year’s losses to over 7%, after President Donald Trump threatened steep new tariffs of the European Union and revived investor concerns over global trade policy.】

item.title: 也许哈佛才是大市场
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 雷亚尔暴跌后巴西改变离岸基金税征收方向
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周五上午表示，为避免投机，值得对这一想法进行审查。【原文：Brazil went back on a plan to tax transfers to offshore funds after the announcement sparked a currency selloff, with Finance Minister Fernando Haddad saying Friday morning that there was an understanding that it was worth reviewing the idea to avoid speculation.】

item.title: 马萨勒姆称美联储必须控制长期通胀预期
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，由于企业和消费者预计近期物价将上涨，官员们正集中精力保持长期通胀预期的稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said officials are focused on keeping long-run inflation expectations stable as businesses and consumers anticipate prices to rise in the near term.】

item.title: 卡尼的能源主管推动油砂公司建立碳捕集系统
item.description: 加拿大新任能源部长表示，为油砂建立碳捕集系统至关重要，并将原油和天然气出口确定为总理马克-卡尼政府的主要优先事项。【原文：Canada’s new energy minister said it’s critical to build carbon-capture systems for the oil sands and identified crude and natural gas exports as a major priority for Prime Minister Mark Carney’s government.】

item.title: 意大利计划坚持对联合信贷银行 BPM 收购案的苛刻条件
item.description: 意大利将保留其对联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购竞争对手 Banco BPM SpA 所施加的严格条件，即使竞购者发起法律诉讼要求放宽这些条件。【原文：Italy is set to keep the strict conditions it imposed on UniCredit SpA to take over rival lender Banco BPM SpA, even if the bidder starts a legal battle to ease those terms.】

item.title: 经济学家称加拿大经济衰退已经开始，贸易战仍在继续
item.description: 据预测，随着失业率上升和出口因与美国的贸易战而下降，加拿大经济很可能处于衰退的早期阶段。【原文：Canada’s economy is likely in the early stages of a recession, according to forecasters, as unemployment rises and exports fall because of a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁重燃增长担忧，美国收益率下滑
item.description: 周五，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收新关税，再次引发了人们对美国经济受损的担忧，并引发股市大跌，国债收益率随之下降。【原文：Treasury yields declined Friday after President Donald Trump threatened new tariffs, reigniting concerns about damage to the US economy and sparking a stock-market selloff.】

item.title: 房价下跌，美国新房销量跃升至 2022 年以来最高点
item.description: 美国 4 月份的新房销售量意外上升，达到 2022 年 2 月以来的最高水平，这很可能得益于建筑商为缓解转售市场面临的负担能力挑战而推出的激励措施。【原文：US new-home sales rose unexpectedly in April to the highest level since February 2022, likely helped by builder incentives aimed at alleviating affordability challenges that have a firm grip on the resale market.】

item.title: 国际米兰希望通过媒体版权筹集私人债务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）正在寻求在私人债务市场上为其由足球俱乐部赞助权和媒体权支持的高收益债券进行再融资。【原文：FC Internazionale Milano SpA is looking at private debt markets to refinance its high yield bonds backed by the football club’s sponsorship and media rights, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说凯捷将暂停收购外包公司 WNS 的谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国IT服务公司凯捷公司（Capgemini SE）收购外包公司WNS控股有限公司（WNS Holdings Ltd.）的谈判已经陷入僵局。【原文：French IT services firm Capgemini SE’s discussions to acquire outsourcing company WNS Holdings Ltd. have stalled, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰晤士河面临新一轮奖金审查，急需解决财务问题
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司的支出受到了英国一群立法者的新一轮审查，因为这家陷入困境的公用事业公司正急于理清其财务状况。【原文：Thames Water’s expenditure has come under fresh scrutiny from a group of UK lawmakers, as the beleaguered utility rushes to sort out its finances.】

item.title: 贝森特预计 90 天关税暂停期结束前将有交易宣布
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他预计在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日宣布的为期 90 天的 "互惠 "税率暂停期结束之前，将与其他国家宣布贸易协议。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he anticipates that trade deals will be announced with other nations ahead of the expiration of the 90-day pause on the steep “reciprocal” rates that President Donald Trump unveiled on April 2.】
